seg.output:
Grace and peace etc.
You have here a living letter, most learned Henry, from our Ludovicus Bovillus, who will explain to you everything, with whom you can speak freely and safely, which we believe to be not our own but Christ's interest. He shall be a sure messenger.
Farewell.
From Scaphusia, 10th of September 1532.
Erasmus Ritter, your friend from the heart.
To Henricus Bullinger, announcing the gospel of Christ at Zurich, my dearest brother.
